content.description: The graph below shows the dose response curves for four different chemicals, labeled <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> â€” <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, in a dose-response study on the effects of the chemicals on mortality in amphibians. All dose experiments began at 0 units of each chemical.
content.question: Based on the data in the graph, which of the four chemicals is the most toxic to amphibians regardless of dose?

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about environmental issues.
